_header: Look thou to thy cradle and I to my stone
_description: One couplet — translating Tu curias quando monstras; ego saxaque pando / Est amor in fando non est amor in sociando, which follows it

CamTCC370.Transcription:
Loke þu to þi cradle & I to my stonefair wordes may
                    þer be but loue neuer none
